think_procedure.step2: Understand the function of 'enable_indexscan'. It controls whether the query planner will use index-scan plan types.
think_procedure.step3: Determine if 'enable_indexscan' has a special value that changes its behavior significantly from its normal operation.
think_procedure.step4: Research or recall that setting 'enable_indexscan' to 'off' (which is equivalent to 0 or false in some contexts) disables index scans entirely, a significant deviation from its normal operation.
think_procedure.step5: Conclude that 'enable_indexscan' is a special knob because it has a special value ('off' or 0) that disables its primary function, unlike its normal operation which allows index scans.
